form.title_form: Add a Habit to your life

key_1.text: Small changes make a big difference.
key_1.author: James Clear

key_2.text: We are what we repeatedly do.
key_2.author: Aristotle

key_3.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
key_3.author: Jim Ryun

key_4.text: You can't improve what you don't measure.
key_4.author: Peter Drucker

key_5.text: Excellence is not an act, but a habit.
key_5.author: Will Durant

key_6.text: The future depends on what you do today.
key_6.author: Mahatma Gandhi

key_7.text: Watch your thoughts, for they will become your words. Watch your words, for they will become your actions. Watch your actions, for they will become your habits.
key_7.author: Lao Tzu

key_8.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
key_8.author: Robert Collier

key_9.text: We first make our habits, then our habits make us.
key_9.author: John Dryden

key_10.text: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
key_10.author: Barack Obama
